title: Belief pt2, Words have Souls, Suffering, JBP, Vervaeke, Tim Keller, TGC, Barfield, CSL,
description:
Part 2 on Belief. Vervaeke decodes the first noble truth/suffering, Tim Keller notes we don't really believe what we think, Paul Maxwell finishes, Owen Barfield Words have Souls, Lewis Abolition of Man, Roger Scruton and JBP on Transcendence. 

Vervaeke Meaning Crisis 13 https://youtu.be/vGB8k7jk1AQ
What's new about the new Calvinism? https://youtu.be/jscdlO1BUj0
Tim Keller Preaching to the Heart https://youtu.be/SWe1E8AMMr8
Paul Maxwell Philosophy overview https://youtu.be/G5i2y5w8Dzc
JBP and Scruton at Cambridge https://youtu.be/XvbtKAYdcZY
Awakening from the Meaning Crisis 11 https://youtu.be/39NpjQDtqNw

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/
